column1: In any event, the Learned Magistrate has issued a writ of possession and the Petitioner
was dispossessed by the order. The Petitioner has failed to challenge the particular order

T
he Petitioner has also failed to show that, the Chairman did not have the authority to

W
e observe that, the Respondents have given sufficient time for the Petitioner to occupy
the quarters even after his retirement.

T
herefore, we hold that, there are no reasons to issue notices to the Respondents as the
1st Respondent has followed the proper procedure when issuing the Quit Notice.

F
or the aforementioned reason, we dismiss the application with costs.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
PRESIDENT OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
